description:
Guided by an ancient map and the light of a magical orb, the group ventures into unknown places, facing challenges and dangers that will test their courage and friendship.

Captain Hook, always seeking power, has discovered Peter's plans and will not rest until he obtains the treasure for himself. The pirates are more determined than ever, and the race between both sides to reach the heart of Neverland is full of surprises, traps and magic.

Can Peter Pan and his friends find the treasure?

Find out in "The Treasure of Neverland"
name: The Treasure of Neverland
intro: In this visual novel set in the magical world of Neverland, Peter Pan and the Lost Boys embark on a quest to discover a treasure hidden deep within the island.
